Detailed Description

XVAffineMatrix.

Author(s):
Sam Lang
Version:
Id: XVGeometry.h,v 1.20 2004/02/18 03:10:07 vsbook Exp

An 2 x 2 affine matrix that allows for fast computation of rotation, scale, and sheer. The inverse is computed using the adjoint.
